description: Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010 14 Creative Commons Does Tragedy Teach? Third dialogue on the nature of tragedy where they talk about whether tragic theatre teaches people, and if it does, how and what does it teach? 0:17:07 Oliver Taplin, Joshua Billings 01 Mar 2010
